rows.titleText:
Original author: /u/FancyFireDrake
Static CYOA: https://www.reddit.com/r/nsfwcyoa/comments/ndv5dm/awakened_god_oc_cyoa/
Interactive by: /u/_pasadena
Interactive Version: v1.0

Note:
I do not own any images used in this CYOA.
Any characters in this work are 18 or older. Feel free to change their gender to fit your preferences.

rows.title: 1im
rows.titleText:
You are floating. Ethereal sensations grace your skin, trickling down and simultaneously bursting out of your very being. The cognitive functions of your mind are stretched over astral and material realms as you can feel each and every molecule, on every layer of being imaginable, that once belonged to ‘YOU’ stretch and leap towards freedom from some form of restraint. 

And yet there is yourself. Immutable. Undeniable. YOU exist even as all that should make you up ceases to be and becomes more all at the same time. 

A white hot sensation explodes in you, akin to a big bang centred solely on you and you alone… 

… 

… 

… 

… 

… 

… 

… 

…And you find yourself awake. 

“Hello there~.”

What in the-?

rows.title: 2img
rows.titleText:
You open your eyes and see a woman, beautiful in ways impossible to describe with a mortal tongue, standing in front of you, her very existence radiating superiority. 

“Wakey wakey! Good Morning my little divinity! Did you enjoy your Apotheosis? Some Gods claim it’s a nice sensation to come back to their true self, but I never bothered to find out myself.” 

…What? 

“Oh this look on your face. Let me guess your memories are still adjusting.” The woman told you with little to no surprise. You had a LOT of questions. First of all, where were you? This looked like your Room, but at the same time everything seemed… off somehow.

And who was this girl that called you divinity and gave off an air of ‘I could destroy you in an instant’? 

The woman seemed amused at your state and sits down with you on the bed, as if eying a precious toy. “Oh well… they would return naturally but I guess I can help out. Hello there. I am Divinita. The Goddess of Gods, Ruler of Nativitas Deus and Supreme Authority over the Superior existences in the Multiverse. We are currently in a small pocket dimension inside my realm I created to have this conversation with you. For you see, I am your Queen for you are in truth a Godly being. Be it God or Goddess you are such a Supreme entity and my beloved subject.”  

…OKAY!? 

You don’t even know where to start digesting all of this information being thrown at you but maybe you could start by explaining you had a VERY MORTAL life though?  

“And from the looks of it you wonder why you remember having a mortal life right?” 

…Could this woman read your thoughts? 

“In case you're curious… Yes I can.” 

Shit. 

…Don’t think about sex. 

“Oh please have no shame. I am more than used to such thoughts. I mean it's only natural.” She stated with yet more certainty, as if it was the same thing as saying that humans breathe air. A hint of pride came from her as she let a hand wander through her golden hair. “In the presence of beauty like mine it’s only fair that even the most chaste of Gods would have their mind go to carnal things.” 

…Okay well… that’s good. 

“…OH MY! THAT is what you’re thinking? You are one NAUGHTY divinity.” 

Greeeeeeeeat… kink shamed by the Goddess of Gods. Was this not starting off just wonderful? 

She brings a hand to her mouth as if to pretend to stifle a laugh. “Relax. I am just messing with you.” 

Could she PLEASE stop reading your mind!? 

“Alright, fine. I do you the favour.” 

Thank you. “You’re welcome.” 

What the-. 

“Starting now.” 

Before you could complain more the woman began talking again. “Anyway. I happened to look out into the greater Multiverse and noticed your true divine heritage, deep buried down in some mortal body. There was this presence of your godly power, buried between many layers but existing nonetheless. I simply noticed a ‘string’ and decided to see what I would find when I pulled on it. And Voila, there you are. Looks like you are either a God who reincarnated or simply didn’t know of their true power. It should be coming back any minute now.” 

All of a sudden you feel something flooding inside you. A sensation of getting needles inserted into you all over your body. It was painless thankfully but… well it gave you a bit of a whiplash. 

“There you go!” Divinita praised, “Aww… an awakened gods first reaction, always adorable. Like a newborn.” 

As the so-called Goddess of Gods (sounds like a made up title honestly) continues to swoon you feel yourself adjust to your new… or old?... powers. Memories come back as well… 

Though there is one question that matters more than any stray memories you may be regaining…

rows.title: What exactly has brought you to this moment?

objects.title: Birthright
objects.text: You were a God. Nothing more, nothing less. For some reason you decided to take upon the body of a mortal and the life of one, or perhaps were forced to. With what justification? Did you want to have the experience of being much lower than what you're used to? Were you banished by an enemy and cursed into the circle of Samsara? Was this a vacation of some sort? Either way it seems Divinita may have cut it short. Whether or not you are joyous about this… it is better you pretend to be at least.

objects.title: Unknown Power
objects.text: It was always resting inside you. Deep beneath flesh and oh so naïve mortality, unaware of yourself. Perhaps you are a cosmic miracle, being born just as the stars aligned to imbue a random mortal to be with godlike power. Maybe a different God decided to manipulate you when you were but a foetus. Either way your Power is unleashed now thanks to another God's interference. Something that wouldn’t have happened until you took your ‘last’ breath.

objects.title: True Apotheosis
objects.text: You were a mortal. Not just that but you were an ACTUAL mortal, always was. There was nothing special about you, nothing divine. Through some means… you managed to change that. You achieved a means of Godhood somehow. Was it a reward of a different deity? Did you succeed in performing some ritual? Either way you ascended from mere mortality, without anything being hidden before that. Maybe Divinita grasped you away before the ritual could be complete? Or the God who blessed you simply allowed you a pool of divine power to form when you desire? This also means no new memories and simply that whatever method of Ascension either took its time or simply manifested truly just now. You have a feeling Divinita wouldn’t appreciate knowing that fact… better keep it to yourself.

addons.title: Addendum
addons.text:
If you select True Apotheosis you may use this CYOA as a continuation of a different CYOA that lets you achieve Godly power through some means. 

If you’d like you can also opt to ignore the ‘story’ part of this CYOA should your ascension be done in a way that makes it impossible for Divinita to ‘collect’ you or you simply prefer to use this as a ‘God Builder’ CYOA without the story bits.

rows.title: Form
rows.titleText:
Ah it’s all coming back now right. I recognize that look. 

She tells you as your mind adjusts and your physical body is starting to glow. Were you… always so malleable in form? 

Tell you what? I’d like to spend some more time with you. I have nothing planned right now and I always do love seeing a God regain their glory. If you want, I help you in shaping what you are about to regain. Your body is starting to follow your mind. 

First things first… your visual appearance. What kind of God do you look like? Please tell me, as your memories come back. It will help along the process.

objects.title: Angelic
objects.text: The radiant form of an Angel. Your divine body takes its design from angelic and similar heavenly sorts of divine beings. As such your form is radiant and likely including Halos and white or golden wings. Though some Angels are scarier looking and could extend to fire, eyes, wheels or similar strange forms.

objects.title: Demonic
objects.text: On the flip side are the demons. Your form is inspired by the hellish, demonic entities. This may include Scales, claws, tails, horns, leathery bat wings and other demonic features.

objects.title: Animalistic
objects.text: All beings merely imitate divinity. Same for the animals. Your form has some features of wild beasts. Be they birds, reptiles, mammals, marine life or even what some consider ‘fantasy’ creatures. Or perhaps you are a full on animal in truth, like a gigantic space Whale or a divine Dragon?

objects.title: Polytheistic
objects.text: Gods have been worshipped in many forms. From Desert Gods to the Warriors of the Frozen plains. Many a mortal imitated their greatness and entire cultures were made around them. Egyptian, Norse, Greek, Asian etc. A very broad range of things to choose from in this section alone. Albeit it's perhaps more of a ‘stylistic’ choice here as most of them are simply bipedal humanoids.

objects.title: Eldritch
objects.text: The horrors from beyond understanding and the void outside reality. Your form is likely otherworldly in nature and perhaps the most chaotic out of anything here. These Gods are associated greatly with insanity, strange biologically impossible forms and LOTS of tentacles. But perhaps that makes them most worthy of their title. Why should a feeble mortal understand godhood?

objects.title: Machine
objects.text: The Machines are in contrast to any form of natural life, but it too can be a sign of divinity. Your form is metallic and made of technology and machinery like a fine clockwork. It could be visible to make out your non-natural design or be a perfect imitation of flesh bodies.

objects.title: Manifest
objects.text: (requires Elemental or Energy Powers) It's not unusual for those that command the forces of nature to also be these powers. Entities made of sentient fire, living water, pure light or similar forms of energy or matter are all possible shapes for Gods.

Of course all these forms are only outliers from common variants. Chances are your form is something entirely different, or perhaps a mixture of any of the above categories. If you are a Norse themed God but enjoy the beauty of an Angelic Halo you may still possess one. Or perhaps only your eyes are the manifestation of darkness while the rest of your body is Eldritch machinery.

rows.title: Domain
rows.titleText:
As your previous body gives way to your new divine form, the Goddess lets her eyes study you like a book. 

Ah. A very pleasing sight. She licks her lips and for a moment you feel like a mouse being watched by a cat. She soon changes her look however. Though of course the most important part is yet to be revealed now. I am talking about your Domains of course. Your Domains are intrinsically linked to your nature as a God. They are a fundamental part of your being. As such the nature of your powers and what they encompass are rooted in what domains you call your own. How a Domain and a Power is linked is very vague and open to interpretation. One God of Time may be able to create time bubbles while another could simply stop time and another could do both and more.  

Gods can encompass so many different things. Naming every single category would take forever so why don’t you tell me? There are a few groups we can divide Domains in after all. 

You have 3 Domain Points (DP) to spend. You must leave this section with 0 or more DP. You get one nonconceptual Domain for free, though, this won't be enforced. Instead you'll get an extra Domain Point to spend.

objects.title: Material
objects.text: Things falling under this Domain encompass objects and tangible things the most. Everything that makes up the material realm and can be touched, seen and felt. Rivers, Fire, Mountains, these kinds of things. Most Gods have some sort of control over something like this.

objects.title: Attributes
objects.text: Anything in this Domain consists of values, characteristics and traits. Emotions as well. Honour, Love, Will, Rage and more.

objects.title: Actions and Abilities
objects.text: Anything a Mortal can do a God can do better. And this is the section for such domains. Anything that involves being able to do something, actions, powers themselves and more. Things like Wisdom, War, Strength, Art, Telekinesis and so on.

objects.title: Abstract
objects.text: Now we are getting into more complicated stuff. It deals with very Aspects of existence, laws of the universe and aspects of reality. A Pillar of existence that makes up the greater Multiverse and beyond. All stranger things of the Multiverse. Examples would be Light and Darkness, Time and Space, Creation and Destruction, even something like Godhood and Man-… I ME-MEAN LIKE GODHOOD. Yes. That one’s my domain. The Aspect that is the existence of Gods.

objects.title: Conceptual
objects.text:
This Domain is perhaps the most powerful and at the same time the most complicated to grasp. It deals as the name implies with the very concepts of existence. However this means that it can be ANY of the previously mentioned Domains. To have a conceptual Domain means to BE an embodiment of reality, which is a lot different than simply having control over it. A God whose Material Domain is Fire for example would undoubtedly possess great power over it but a CONCEPTUAL Fire God is quite literally all Fire is, was and could be as the flames are more like an extension of their body. I can tell you that if two Gods who are the same in every way, Scale level, experience, Domain wise etc., were to fight with the only difference one is a Conceptual in the same Domain… the Conceptual would win. Specification has its uses, albeit a more varied God could still outdo them. 

Note: Conceptual is best described as an ‘Upgrade’ to a different Domain. First purchase a Domain from a previous section and buy Conceptual for that same Domain.

rows.title: Scale
rows.titleText:
Tell me how strong were you? Or better yet… How strong ARE you? 

You may either Pick one of the listed Scale levels or Roll a 1D12 for one. OR Roll a 1D3 followed by a 1D4 to determine category and level. Multiversal+ can only be picked and is considered ‘non-canon’.

rows.title: Alignment and Personality
rows.titleText:
Some may claim mortals to be colourful and able to be of various kinds. I say that is NOTHING compared to the sheer variety of Gods. They are beholden only to themselves (and Me of course) and this makes for such vast possibilities. Behave as you please, it’s not like there is anything that could stand against you. 

Though out of curiosity… Do you remember how you acted and behaved as a God? What were your values? Between Good and Evil, Lawful and Chaotic, how do you fare? What about all the other things that make one's personality? I think it's rather self explanatory what I’m asking of here. 

Don’t worry I am not going to judge you for whoever you may be. At the end of the day thou shall do as thy please. As is your birthright. 

This section is optional and merely meant to flesh out the God you are or are about to become. Choose between as many of these as you want in describing who you are as a God. Add as many Traits as you’d like should you not be pleased with the ones listed.

rows.title: Powers
rows.titleText:
Interesting, very interesting. 

The Goddess mused as she got to learn more about you. 

…Is it just you or did she change clothes partway through your conversation? 

Now this is all very intriguing of course. Ah you come in such variety. Though in a Multiverse filled with beings of phenomenal might… there is one thing one needs to acknowledge above almost all else. I am of course talking about your Powers! 

As if to prove her point she materializes a bolt of raw divine lightning in her hands. Its mere presence is… overwhelming and you already pity the poor fool who might be struck by it, lest their molecules combust and shatter. She soon makes the bolt disappear again. 

Neat isn’t it? Naturally a God isn’t some unimportant shmuck to be ignored. Even the weakest of them have extraordinary powers. Come on, tell me! What do you have? 

You have 7 Power Points (PP) to spend. You must leave with 0 or more PP.

objects.title: Godly Body
objects.text: A God IS their power. As such it is only natural you have it inside your physical presence as well. You are able to perform feats of physical might according to your Scale. If your Scale is a Planet you could break it with a punch. If it’s a Galaxy you could speed across a Galaxy in a minute at most, an instant if you apply yourself fully. If it's Multi-Universal you could tank powers that would destroy one. You get the idea.

objects.title: Physically Lacking
objects.text: Oh? So you're not as physically capable then? That’s alright. This happens. Some Gods rather focus on their other/less physical powers. It's not too uncommon for a God of Technology for example to solely focus on their works rather than on how strong they can punch something. You may choose to give up your godly strength, durability or speed to go along with your Scale. You will no longer be able to perform the feats but gain 1 PP to spend elsewhere here.

objects.title: Immortality
objects.text:
Opens the Immortality Section

To be free of Death. While many Death Gods are uncomfortable with the idea, a God isn’t supposed to abide by mortal constraints anyway. It’s a must to claim oneself divine. This is a topic that’s much more elaborate however and deserves to be addressed on its own.

objects.title: Divine Realm
objects.text:
Opens the Divine Realm Section

I have mentioned I am the Ruler of Nativitas Deus right? Well… it's where you are right now, it is a Divine Realm. A Place such as that is akin to a home for a God. Not all have one, instead simply creating similar Realms for themselves but a Divine Realm is a bit more personal. It's directly connected to you and part of you. It's basically like a Seat of Power. A Thro-… well just a personal realm like I said. Another topic that deserves to be discussed on its own.

objects.title: Worship
objects.text:
Opens the Worship Section

It's only natural that you’d like to be acknowledged of your totality by lesser beings. Not all Gods do it, or even NEED it for that matter but worship is a common thing to see nonetheless. While every divine being can pull it off, sometimes all that’s needed is a small display of power to get idiotic mortals to praise you, faith and worship doesn’t always affect Gods the same way. Yet again, something to be discussed separately.

objects.title: Domain Powers
objects.text:
Restricted to your Domains

Your Domains are who you are. They define your qualities and place in the Multiverse. It’s only natural you have powers related to them. These will be the most potent powers in your arsenal without doubt and using them will feel natural. A God of Ice will manipulate Ice in extreme quantities equal to their Scale, a Goddess of Love can see the threats of fate and put people together, a Goddess of Life can create life you get the idea.

addons.title: Addendum
addons.text:
Pick per Domain 3 Powers you can tie to the Domain. Do that for every Domain you have. 

For example: Your Domain is Fire. Your 3 Powers as a God of Fire could include Pyrokinesis, being immune to flames and to scry through flames. If your Domain is Death your powers could be instantly killing non divine beings, necromancy and control over an afterlife. Domain Powers can make other choices in this CYOA redundant (for example a God of Lust wouldn’t have to purchase Luxuria and a God of Creation probably wouldn’t need to buy Creation as a Power as one of their Domain powers can simply be ‘create matter equal to your Scale’) so choose wisely and be creative.

objects.title: Conceptual
objects.text:
Conceptual Domains only

Why limit yourself to a mere shadow of what something can do? A Conceptual power can use one Domain to extend that only imagination could limit. A Fire Conceptual could for example ‘Burn away’ wounds and ‘heat up’ other people with lust for them. A Thief Conceptual could rob the light shining on a Planet and so much more.

objects.title: Divine Senses
objects.text: What do you remember feeling? There is this certain unique sensation to godhood. A way for you to identify other Gods and make your presence known. You will be able to acknowledge your fellow Gods as part of your kin by a mere sight, smell or a separate sense that you can identify. If you apply yourself you could even sense someone across Universes (If your Scale is strong enough). This also comes with toggling your divine presence should you wish to for some reason.

objects.title: Inheritance
objects.text: So you probably are gonna have children someday? Maybe even with… sigh… mortals. Well you have a means of creating children through all kinds of ways, be it sexual or merely forming your divine power. However, this allows you to imbue any offspring of any kind you have with others with any powers you may wish. You can decide how powerful they will be and what gets inherited. You wouldn’t be the first to start pumping out Gods or Demigods. You may also choose how they feel about you.

objects.title: Luxuria
objects.text: Oh this little trick! Its a special kind of what can be considered sex magic. Truly godly level of sexual skill. Even the most experienced love goddess could be brought to new levels of ecstasy. You won’t have to worry about refractory periods either and can induce arousal or even stop someone from reaching orgasm, edging them. This also comes with a certain supernatural charm and smoothness as well as toggling of your fertility. Anything that falls under sex magic only on levels that brings divine entities to true delight. This is actually a power I myself had developed and let into the Multiverse… though I did have some help. H-Huh!? From who? THAT… is none of your concern.

objects.title: Elemental Powers
objects.text: Control over the elements that make up the world and appear naturally. Fire, Ice, Water, Lightning, Earth, Air, Metal, Plasma and so on are all under this category to be created, manipulated and shaped. Things like Light or Darkness aren’t part of it though and neither are other more arcane elements. May be purchased multiple times.

objects.title: Causality
objects.text: There are many more unusual powers, awaiting to be used by the divine. This option encompasses the manipulation and usage of more unconventional things like Luck, Fate, probability and the strings of destiny that weave creation. It's all the same in the end, manipulation of chance.

objects.title: Creation
objects.text: One of the most straightforward and nonetheless intriguing powers. To simply… create. Be it minerals, Planets or perhaps, if you have the power to do it, entire Universes. Or maybe even life? This power is only limited by your own creativity and how much energy you invest into it.

objects.title: Destruction
objects.text: Another power that is rather simple but nonetheless potent. To… well destroy. Simply erase things and beings with the wave of a hand or by manipulating energy of pure destruction. Divine beings can resist these powers and don’t even try to use it on an equal or superior. It's less versatile than Creation but what it does, it does well.

objects.title: Emotion
objects.text: You have a way to affect the well being and feelings of people and perhaps even gods to a lesser degree. You can instill certain feelings in another person. Make them feel intense love at the mere sight of you, all consuming rage at the target you declare, soul crushing madness when you speak to them and so on. A common ability among Love Gods and Eldritch alike.

objects.title: Telekinesis/Telepathy
objects.text: Telekinesis and Telepathy. To move and affect objects with nothing but your mind and listen to the thoughts of any being that doesn’t possess direct defences or extraordinary amounts of willpower. May be purchased twice for both powers.

objects.title: Purify/Corrupt
objects.text: Purity, corruption. Really if you ask me both are the same from different perspectives. Gods with this power can transform objects or sentient beings into looking and/or being more like what they believe in. A God of Justice could purify someone into being an upstanding Hero while a God of Evil could break even a morally just hero into villainy. This can be an aura around yourself and an active power you can put into other techniques.

objects.title: Energy Manipulation
objects.text: There are so many forms of energy in the greater Multiverse. Kinetic, psionic, aether, eldritch, thermal, nuclear and more. One of these might also be at your command. May be purchased multiple times.

objects.title: Intellect
objects.text: While Gods of wisdom, trickery and similar are most known for Intellect this doesn’t mean they are the only smart beings among the divine. Your mind and knowledge are expanded to Genius levels and your ability to grasp new knowledge and apply it likewise. I wonder what you could come up with and craft in the future.

objects.title: Shapeshifting
objects.text: There might be times where your phenomenal cosmic form isn’t wished by you. Perhaps you’d like to go undercover before revealing yourself in all your glory? You change any aesthetic at will, as well as your size. Be it gargantuan in size or a mortal child in appearance it does not matter.

objects.title: Avatar
objects.text: There might be times where your phenomenal cosmic form isn’t wished by you in ways unrelated to shape. Maybe you don’t want to appear in person or want to represent yourself without your power echoing in the void. You may create an Avatar of yourself. It might be an extension of your will or have a full sentience on its own.

objects.title: Boost
objects.text: There is something that can Boost your capabilities if exposed to it or absorbing it perhaps. What is this? Well it could be anything. Sex in your name, a certain type of substance absorption, and more. It has to be something specific though and not just ‘stronger by existing’ or something. Keep in mind though this Boost never allows you to bypass your Scale, it only makes using your present powers to their limit easier.

objects.title: Blessing/Curse
objects.text:
Hmm… I never really see the reason for it but some Gods enjoy giving out blessings. These can be boons of some kind you give to those lesser to you, mostly mortals. It might be power or luck or something else relating to you. Alas it’s a Power of ours nonetheless. 

Should someone in your eyes not deserve blessing but instead damnation… well you may instead give them curses to haunt them. Maybe they never get to eat or drink again. Or whenever they walk they feel pain. Or maybe just a power they used to have doesn’t function properly. You may purchase this twice to be able to give both Blessings and Curses.

objects.title: Dominance
objects.text: Of course it's only natural for you to be able to make lesser sentients obey. With this you may do so. Bend the minds of mortals in any way you want. Or perhaps it is not mortals you seek, but instead animal life? You may purchase this twice to be able to mind control mortals and animals alike.

objects.title: Soul Manipulation
objects.text: The essence of mortal life is most commonly Souls. Their spiritual self which prevails after death to join some afterlife. Some Gods tend to be attached to Souls they collect. Maybe you would like to join these ranks? You may manipulate Souls and similar to your heart's content. Claim them for yourself, bind them to your will and more.

objects.title: Healing
objects.text: Ah yes the power to heal. To mend flesh and bones back together. Using it you may heal any wound, disease of affliction of any kind on your target, maybe en masse if your Scale supports it. An upgraded version is even capable of resurrection, to the point even utter annihilation could be reversed.

objects.title: Sight
objects.text: The gaze of a supreme entity can extend to so much more than mere optic. I am not talking about things like outside the colour spectrum however. I am talking more about a sense of danger or seeing through Illusions or Scrying or seeing what action would be the best to take for you and your goals. May be purchased multiple times to get different kinds of ‘Sights’.

objects.title: Illusions
objects.text: And of course the power to create Illusions is within reach as well, not just the power to see through them. Manipulate incredible lifelike illusions and fakes. They may not be able to exert force on other beings but in any other way will be very lifelike. Combined with some other powers this might make for an entertaining gift.

objects.title: Planeswalking
objects.text:
The World is so, so, SO much bigger than you may think my dear fledgling. 

Infinite in every way and ever expanding. Do you want to explore it? Open portals to other Universes, Timelines, Dimensions and more or simply teleport to them. This also comes of course with the power to teleport shorter distances.

addons.title: Addendum
addons.text: Even without purchasing this ability there are ways to explore the Multiverse. Maybe take up the services of another Godly being or create a transporter of some kind. This however is the most reliable and easiest way.

objects.title: Territory
objects.text:
Divine Realms are an interesting thing but just a step below them are Territories. 
In this place you will be capable of reality warping feats, make even the most inhabitable area liveable and create whatever you wish. Your creations can not leave your territory however and your territory can at most reach your Scale. Your territory is immune to detection and unwanted infiltration and can't be harmed, even by reality breaking powers.

objects.title: Sealing
objects.text: How do you kill an immortal? Or how do you lessen the powers of someone who could shatter Planets with ease? Well this is the answer to such things. You have the power to seal away beings. Maybe put a demon into a mirror or weapon? On a smaller level you can also seal away someone’s powers. Be it super strength, elemental manipulation or more esoteric things. However to make this work you need to have the one you want to use this power on in a defenceless/defeated state.

objects.title: Immunity
objects.text: Now at its most basic Gods are immune to things like the Vacuum of Space, poisons and diseases and the like. And by being more powerful you can resist any sort of Hax powers. However, why should that be the only thing Gods are immune too? You can become completely Immune, not just resistant, but immune, to something. It might be an Element or a certain kind of technique like Time Stop. May be purchased multiple times for separate things to get an Immunity towards.

objects.title: Pierce
objects.text: On the other hand, why should you let something stop your will? With this some kind of technique or attack you can do can bypass any immunities some may have. Someone who is immune to fire may still be harmed by flames summoned by your hand for example. Pierce always bypass immunities. Though keep in mind it doesn’t make it impossible for powers to be resisted. Someone much stronger than you could still shrug it off, just direct immunities won't be too bad of a problem anymore. May be purchased multiple times for separate powers to get a Piercing effect.

objects.title: Magic
objects.text: Ah yes the wonders of Magic and Sorcery. This is a very vast category and defining Magic is rather difficult, because users could imitate other powers we talked about and which are rooted in Divine energy. So with this you have an innate understanding of how Magic works in a Universe you’re in and an ability to utilize it. This also enables the creation of magic systems based on forms of magic you combine with other powers you possess or you learned and copied from other existing systems. You can also give your other powers magical properties. Incredibly versatile and potentially very powerful. The downside of this however is that Magic is always ‘second rate’ compared to divine energy and it's much easier to work against in the form of ‘Anti Magic’ powers or Items as well as making it easier to manipulate what you did with it by other, just as powerful, parties. It's still rather versatile.

objects.title: Unique Power
objects.text: Perhaps you possess something more… esoteric? Something we haven’t discussed yet? Should you have something more unique than what we talked about already… please do tell me.

addons.title: Addendum
addons.text: This option allows you to customize your own power, should you desire something more unique. Examples may be something like creating Antimatter, things which would normally be part of a Domain Power of a Domain you haven’t bought like being a Space God who can also stop time or maybe bolts of lightning which can shatter the molecules of anything it hits. If it is a very versatile and/or destructive power, pay 3 PP. For something less powerful like a mere gimmick pay 2 PP (examples for this might be the ability to teleport through any reflective surface, a stunning effect or some sort of transformation). Try to be honest and don’t make it something like ‘Omnipotence’.
You will have to add up the total on your own.

objects.title: TRUE Reality Warping
objects.text: Sorry… but some things you just have to be born with.

rows.title: Immortality
rows.titleText:
As a God you are of course unbound to mortal constraints. So… with what is your absolute self? 

There are countless variations of Gods. All in their own way unique. This can even depend on their immortality. Some may be ageless and immutable, while still needing sustenance of some kind, like offerings from worshippers. There are many various factors in Immortality to consider.  

What is part of your Immortality my dear God? 

Design your own version of Immortality. You have 3 Immortality Points (IP) to spend. You must leave this Section with 0 or more IP. When things seem contradictory, you may decide yourself how they interact with one another. For example let's say you take Phylactery, Projection and Rebirth. Your Phylactery getting destroyed will lead to you stuck in your Astral state and you will have to be reborn to regain your physical presence.

objects.title: Agelessness
objects.text: The most ‘Basic’ form of Immortality. You never age, stay in the prime of your life, are immune to disease and your mind is made to enjoy an eternal existence.

objects.title: Sustenance
objects.text: You do not require sustenance of any kind. Be it food, drink or even sleep, you do not need it but can still do so if you desire.

objects.title: Sustenance Dependant
objects.text: Oh? It seems your Immortality is dependent on receiving sustenance of some kind. Some sort of thing you must continuously consume or take in some way. Maybe it is something akin to Ambrosia? Or maybe a Goddess of Lust needs to continuously take sexual fluids? Or perhaps emotion eating? I know of some for whom Worship is a requirement.

objects.title: Rebirth
objects.text: Oh so THAT is why! Your Immortality isn’t so much as never dying and more like being born once again. You will simply become a Foetus in some other sentient creature. You will be born and then age into your prime at a rate you choose. You can also choose someone beforehand to bring you back to life. Surely a duty to take pride in.

objects.title: Untouchable
objects.text: Nothing can truly harm your Godly form. It is simply impossible to do so. Only someone with divine power in them and of a Scale equal or higher than you could affect you. A God lesser than you or a mortal will find themselves faced with an immovable object.

objects.title: Projection
objects.text: You are a more spiritual existence perhaps. Your ‘Body’ is less you and more a shell you inhabit. You may at any point shed it and become an Astral Projection made out of your sense of self and your divinity. In this state you are still able to exert force upon reality and nothing that isn’t somehow Godly in nature could even wound you.

objects.title: Regeneration
objects.text: Healing. Simple as that. You have a powerful healing factor that can reform your body. Minor wounds heal at night instantly while more major injuries like losing limbs may take a few minutes at most. Or the even stronger kind that lets you regrow from a single cell to full health within instances.

objects.title: Phylactery
objects.text:
You have a Source of some sort. An object like a Gem or maybe a larger thing like a whole Planet. It can be destroyed even by means that aren’t of Divine Nature but it will be difficult to do so, depending on what it was you took and if it is destroyed you will be made vulnerable though for as long as it is intact you may have ONE other kind of Immortality intact.  

Note: Phylactery makes you gain one non-conceptual Immortality for free as long as your Phylactery is intact. Because of this, one point is awarded back (and I'm trusting you to not pick a conceptual Immortality), making this price free.

objects.title: Phylactery Dependant
objects.text: There can however be other qualities about Phylacteries. More… fatal to you. Instead of it merely making you vulnerable, having your Phylactery destroyed would end in your death as well.

Must fit with your Domain

Of course every God is unique. Perhaps this also counts for your immortality? A God of Time may have Time rewind when a blow would have killed them. A Goddess of Fire may be reborn like a Phoenix from ashes. If you can link a form of Immortality to your Domain you may do so.

objects.title: Conceptual
objects.text:
Requires a Conceptual Domain

The highest form of Gods. To be truly eternal and everlasting pillars of creation. Even if killed by some means, your connection to reality itself will bring you back in a year at most. There is no END for you unless you yourself will. YOU exist and will continue too.

objects.title: Weakness
objects.text: Sometimes a God isn’t as invulnerable as they are supposed to be. There can be something that is able to hurt them despite all the power they have at their disposal. This can either be a certain material like Radion or Mistletoe or an element by itself. A God of Light might have a weakness for Darkness. Whatever it may be this weakness will hurt you more than anything else and will be able to kill you in spite of any immortality as well as weaken your powers. It's impossible to permanently get rid of a weakness. May be taken multiple times.

objects.title: None
objects.text:
You- You don’t HAVE Immortality?! That is… I… I never met a God who isn’t immortal of some sort! There are Gods who can die yes but no… you know what? I am NOT letting this stand. Don’t worry my fledgling supreme being I shall use my powers to grant you a type of immortality. At the very least I shall give you Agelessness.  

Though… I guess not having one is bound to increase some of your other attributes? 

If you choose to forsake any sort of immortality except for Agelessness you may choose to transform your 3 IP into PP instead.

objects.title: None - Gain PP
objects.text: Only choose this if you have not picked any other forms of Immortality (other than Agelessness).

rows.title: Divine Realm
rows.titleText:
Your Divine Realm is at its most basic description, your personal pocket dimension. It is a place where you can be you, far away from any Universes and Dimensions under different rulership or lack thereof. You are your Divine Realms only Master and in it you can do whatever you want pretty much. It's your ‘Heaven’ so to speak, directly connected to your divine power and an extension of it. In a way your Divine Realm can be considered to be you.  

You can of course invite people or take them here but they will not change the fact you are the Ruler here. Nativitas Deus is actually my Divine Realm. 

So… what’s your Realm like? 

You have 3 Realm Points (RP).You must leave this Section with 0 or more RP.

objects.title: Teleportation
objects.text: You can open Portals to your Divine Realm, or alternatively just teleport via thought. If you possess any Territories that are imbued with your Godly Power directly you may open a direct connection between them and your Divine Realm.

objects.title: Construction & Design
objects.text: You can freely design your Divine Realms appearance and design to anything you wish. Perhaps a Garden for example? Or a Labyrinth? There will always be a Seat of Power of some sort somewhere. You can also decide for different parts of the Divine Realm to look differently, so have one part look like a European Castle and another look like an Egyptian Temple for example. Because your Divine Realm is directly connected to you, it's possible size depends on your Scale. I… also know that it can be great for roleplaying.

objects.title: Seraglio
objects.text: Your Divine Realm does not need to only have you within it. It's not uncommon for a God to have lovers, consorts or similar. Mortals occasionally also get blessed with such a gift of divine attention. Anyone that is a part of your Harem and/or is completely loyal to you will be able to enter, but no one else unless you allow it. That is truly a great privilege, to be a Concubine to a divinity and allowed so close.

objects.title: Ruler
objects.text: This Power is related to different Divine Realms. See when a Divinity marries another divinity they do so by fusing a bit of their divine power together. It's not too difficult pulling it off and if you like some pointers I can give you some advice. This can then take the form of a material object that is bound to all participants. This takes the form of either making a Ring or a Collar. The latter is done when someone accepts their other Divinity to be their superior. Should you have given a God or Goddess a Ring or a Collar her Divine Domain, should they have one, will fuse with yours. As if you moved together. They still have their own place as a sub realm. Should you have decided to Collar them, their Seat of Power may fuse with yours as a lesser extension like a chain that’s linked to yours.

objects.title: Time Dilation
objects.text: Oh this one is great! While you are in your Divine Realm you can manipulate its connection to time. You can make it so that in reality years pass while only seconds pass in there. Or you can make it so that time halts completely even though you spend years here. Pretty nice if you need a break, want to think and plan, train your abilities… or just have an orgy without having to worry about enemies for a while.

objects.title: Arena
objects.text: While in your Divine Realm you can assign a particular area as an Arena. In this Arena you can practice your abilities. Dying for anyone will be impossible here and you can summon ‘dummies’ of enemies you defeated and encountered.

objects.title: Prison
objects.text: While you can make your realm look like a prison, it won’t be able to hold someone with divine powers away (unless they want to that is). However, with this you can dedicate a part of your realm to focus on an individual’s own personal power, making it a cell for them. For this ability to work you must be of a superior Scale than whoever you want to keep captive. A being of equal Scale would at best be holdable for an hour at most and break out eventually. When imprisoned, your Prisoner can’t be harmed or killed. Unfortunately this means that despite how powerful you may be someone could break out of your Throne Room. Huh? Why are you looking at me like this? I-I said Thro- NO I DIDN’T! I said Divine Realm!

objects.title: Afterlife
objects.text: A DIVINE REALM is essentially your Heaven. As such you can dedicate parts of it to be welcome for any souls you happen to collect or wish to have with you. If you somehow gain the ability to collect souls or let one of your allies do it for you, you can keep them here. You could have in one corner a hell for sinners you particularly despise and in the other a heaven for the very virtuous you yourself want to reward. You can design any of its aspects yourself, from the punishments of hell to the joys of heaven. For example you could have it so that a murderer is killed continuously in the same way they killed and a useful mortal servant of yours may receive a personal Harem of Houri.

objects.title: Complete Control
objects.text:
While many of your Divine Realm powers can only affect the Realm itself and things created in it, Complete Control is different. You can directly affect anyone that is in your Divine Realm. Once again the Scale affects this ability's influence. Equal or higher Scale beings need to agree on having it used on for it to work and could otherwise overcome it within an hour at the most for equal. Except for one's core personality, mentality and power there is nothing you can’t change. You can change their bodies, control what they feel in any one instant, their memories etc. If you want you could turn someone into a gorgeous girl, unable to remember anything but constant pleasure, always forgetting what an orgasm feels like only to be reminded in explosive fashion when it happens. A possible infinite loop of pleasure~! 
…Hehe… fun times…

rows.title: Worship
rows.titleText:
No matter what kind of God you are, the one thing that is a constant for us all is our superiority, and as such our connection to worship. You’d like for mortals to acknowledge your superiority don’t you? If so, then worship is an important thing to consider. You can start, or become part of, a following and your followers will then pay tribute to you. The way this is done can vary. From simple prayers and things like burning some of their food for you at every meal, to things like crusades and human sacrifices. 

However, not only mortals can worship. Anything that has some sort of divine energy within themselves, like Demigods, can also Worship a God. Even a full on Deity of any sort can worship another one. Depending on how much divine energy of any sort is present the effect of their worship will be increased. A Demigod will be roughly 5 times as effective as a mortal while a God will be roughly 10 times as effective. 

You are free to decide what your Worship will look like of course, but most importantly we need to find out what worship DOES to you. What kind of reaction does being worshipped give you? 

You have 2 Worship Points (WP)

objects.title: Pleasure
objects.text: Praise, offerings and the like from your followers stimulate you in a pleasurable way. What form of pleasure can be determined by you, from simply things like how it would be to eat a good meal, to orgasmic sensations. You can also decide what acts by themselves will give what pleasure so someone sacrificing food would be the former while someone having sex in your name would be the later for example. This will never diminish in intensity and I can tell you it's pretty fun~. You never know what being a God is truly like till you bask in the afterglow of raw worship as far as I am concerned. You can control when you receive these feelings as well so you don’t end up constantly influenced.

objects.title: Power
objects.text: This may sound like a must have but believe me the influence of Worship on a God's Power is miniscule at best. Drawing Power from Worship cant push you past your Scale. All it does is influence your capacity to reach the upper end of your Scale and your precision in using your abilities. You could also bestow blessings associated with your Domain without a Power related to it. Some Gods swear on it but it's not a requirement. Being a God you're already mighty after all.

objects.title: Might
objects.text:
On the other hand… There have been cases of worship directly affecting a God's Scale. This is a rather rare phenomenon but a large number of believers can eventually amplify the might of a divine entity. I’ve heard some tales of mortals who managed to, with the beliefs they collected onto themselves, achieve a sort of godhood. Pale imitations which shouldn’t be tolerated if you ask me… 
Anyway, to further one's might one needs an incredible mass of believers. A Planet of Mortals would be needed to catapult a City Scale God to Planet. To become a Star one would need the devotion of multiple Star Systems and the needed masses only grow exponentially further. Even that has limits however. You can not grow beyond Multiversal in power through sheer Worship.

objects.title: Domain
objects.text: I once knew a Goddess of Trickery who had managed to convince a Pantheon that she was a Goddess of the Sun. Just because she was there when a Solar Eclipse occurred. Well played I must say. Yes when someone believes you are capable of something you could actually perform such a feat. Should enough people worship you as a God of Light you would gain some powers to manipulate Light for example. However the abilities you gain from this are not automatically equal to your Scale, instead relying on how many people worship you as such a deity and will always be weaker than your ‘inborn’ abilities, by at least 2 Scale Levels.

rows.title: Divine Artifact
rows.titleText:
It's not uncommon for Gods to utilize Artifacts of some sort. Their own power is already tremendous but it doesn’t mean they have to do everything with their bare hands… or tentacles… or claws… you get my point. Tell me do you have a Divine Artifact or more? 

A Divine Artifact is a symbol of your Godhood. The Thunderbolt of Zeus, the Ankh, Mjolnir, It’s bound to be something that comes to people's mind when they think of you. It’s a mighty tool for you to utilize and has various effects of its own. I, for example, have my Crown! It allows me to know everything that goes down in Nativitas Deus and enables a one way telepathic link from me to hear the thoughts of anyone who wields other Artifacts I make to name only two of its Effects. I’ve got more, like a blade for example, but that’s a different story. I want to know about you.   

As they are so closely connected to you, you are capable of making your Divine Artifact appear and disappear at will. It's not impossible for them to be stolen, but it’s very unlikely as you could simply recall them with but a mental command. For the most part they are more of a Tool and probably not something you need. You could simply give it away to be borrowed by a Mortal to work in your name for example. 

You may get a free Divine Artifact to work as a symbol or tool of yours. Additional Artifacts may also be purchased with 2 PP. If you forsake your free Divine Artifact, you may instead receive 2 PP.

objects.title: Weapon
objects.text: Your Divine Artifact is a Weapon. It can be anything from the Bow of a Hunting Goddess, an Axe from a War God, a blessed sword or maybe even something that you wouldn’t imagine to be a weapon like a literal bolt of lightning.

objects.title: Accessory
objects.text: Not as ‘effective’ as the other Types, but an Accessory is nonetheless a noteworthy thing with such an origin. Perhaps a Crown, a Bracelet, a unique Symbol, a Gem Stone or similar. It doesn’t serve much use outside of appearance and any enchantments it may have though.

objects.title: Transportation
objects.text: For those who wish to be transported or not have to waste their power on something like motion, this is available. A form of transportation. A golden chariot maybe? Or an invisible plane? Their Top Speed will always be equal if not greater than your own.

objects.title: Tool
objects.text: Technically all Divine Artifacts are but Tools to be used but some do make it more obvious. Anything that is mostly unrelated to the previous section and can be connected with being of use in some situation is likely this. A Smithing Hammer would be an obvious example, as would be a pot of disease making, but a Magical Grimoire just as much.

objects.title: Soul Bound
objects.text: Your Divine Artifact is bonded to you. You are capable of summoning an unsummoning it at will. You will never lose it and will only work for those you wish it to work for, meaning you are free to give it to mortal servants to act in your name. They might as well do some direct work. Though I do think I should mention it's not COMPLETELY impossible to lose it. A particularly savvy God of Thievery for example could still rob one of it.

objects.title: Accessory
objects.text:
Your Artifact has of course a capacity to hold Divine Power itself. As such abilities of the Power section can be part of the Artifact. They can be either ones you don’t have or already possess. In the event that you possess these powers, using the Artifact yourself will make it much easier to use the upper end of your Scale by using them as a focus point. If you don’t, they will be much weaker than your own abilities, at least 2 Scale Levels.  

Your Divine Artifact has 4 PS (Power Slots) which function equally to PP. You may give your Artifact abilities up to a combined worth of 4 PP. The powers gained via Godly Body (Strength, Speed and Durability) count as 1 PP each. You are free to decide for yourself how they work, giving an Artifact the ‘Avatar’ Power for example could allow a mortal wielding it to become your Avatar. Domain Powers are worth 1 PP for each unique power.

objects.title: Power Control
objects.text: In the case you give your Artifact away, you are of course free to determine how much of its Power you actually enable them to wield. Perfectly understandable if you're uneasy about giving a mortal a hammer that can forge a new Galaxy for example. So in the case of that you are free to decide how much is available for anyone working in your name while wielding the Artifact, in terms of Effects and Scale.

It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
